content.newsInsight: China just dominated at the UN climate summit while American CEOs stayed home. Beijing's playing the long game, filling the leadership vacuum Trump created. Smart money sees this as the real geopolitical shift of 2024.
content.patternInsight: You're still reading. That already puts you ahead.
content.intelligenceExample: China dominating climate talks while US execs skip, for example. We read that and our mind goes to: Which Western companies will lose their ESG credentials by missing this power shift?
content.contentReminder: Remember how Focus showed China seizing climate leadership, and What We Do wondered about Western ESG credential risks?
